meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sara Wilska Tom Massimo Elisabeth Corkran Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4384.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Sara Wilska, a contracts manager from Vienna, Virginia
Tom Massimo, an equity trader from New York, New York
Elisabeth Corkran, a human resources coordinator from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,600)

tr.td: THEIR FIRST NOVELS
LET'S GO BOWLING
AMERICAN FOOD
WAYNE MAN
PIRATES
"ARG"
